text:
-3-
Mr. Chairman, this program, properly operated, can give meaning
and substance to the American dream; improperly done, it is without value.
Of all the things I have undertaken in a lifetime, this one excites and challenges
me as much as any. Because of its great potential I am troubled by the
responsibility not to err. But in its future I deeply believe and will commit
the best I have to its success.
